questions.question: If a large vehicle swings left but has their right turn signal on and you are also turning right...

answers.text: stay beside the large vehicle on the right.
wait until the large vehicle turns before you turn right.
squeeze between the large vehicle and the curb.

answers.text: The length of daylight becomes longer than the length of darkness.

The length of daylight and darkness are approximately equal.
It varies depending on the location.
